subject: Re: Hello!
body:
Hi there lovely,
This kind of opportunity comes ones in a lcife. I don't want 
to miss it. Do you? I am coming to your place in few days a
and I though may be we can meet each other. If you don't mind
I can send you my picture. I am a girl.
You can correspond with me using my email fxxkr@MailVisionWorld.info
